content.question: In line 5, manibus catenas gerebat is translated

choices.label: chains were being worn on his hands
he was wearing chains on his hands
a chain was worn around his hands
his hands were wearing a chain

content.answer: he was wearing chains on his hands

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
